title: Solr Tutorial (quickstart.html) broken without javadocs in Solr package
description:
The first indexing example in the Solr Quick Start (aka Solr Tutorial) at https://lucene.apache.org/solr/quickstart.html
is to index the javadocs. Since SOLR-9450 removed the javadocs from the Solr package, there is only 1 file in the docs/ directory, effectively breaking that example.

There are a couple options:


	rework the example. Perhaps use the basic crawling capability of bin/post instead? Is that too advanced for new users at this early stage?
	remove or replace the example. The later querying examples assume the javadocs are in the index, so those would also need to be reworked.

comments.content: I think this can be closed as (essentially) a duplicate of SOLR-10842 ?
